title: Analysis code for 'Legumes as a substitute for red and processed meat, poultry, or fish, and the risk of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease in a large cohort'

creators.affiliation: Department of Public Health, Aarhus University, Aarhus, Denmark
creators.name: Fie Langmann

creators.affiliation: Department of Public Health, Aarhus University, Aarhus, Denmark
creators.name: Daniel B. Ibsen

creators.affiliation: Steno Diabetes Center Aarhus, Aarhus, Denmark
creators.name: Luke W. Johnston

creators.affiliation: European Commission, Joint Research Center, Ispra, Italy
creators.name: Aurora Perez-Cornago

creators.affiliation: Department of Public Health, Aarhus University, Aarhus, Denmark
creators.name: Christina C. Dahm

description: This analysis code examines the replacement of red and processed meat, poultry, or fish for equal amounts of legumes on the risk of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD). This research project uses the UK Biobank Resource under Application Number 81520.
